name: Under the Hedge
description:
Designer
Evan Bruchinger

Class/Semester
Game Design Technologies M102, Fall 2016

Engine
Unreal

Genre
Adventure

Description
In Under The Hedge, players begin in a mysterious room and are told to find the Trapper’s control room. As they attempt to navigate the maze they find themselves in, they are confronted by surreal obstacles. Players will need to think on their feet to find that room and complete this adventure.

http://mcgamedesign.com/
